mapper.select: SELECT ADDRESS, PARK_NAME, PARK_DIST, HOS_NAME, HOS_DIST, SUB_NAME, SUB_DIST, BUS_NAME, BUS_DIST, PARKING_NAME, PARKING_DIST, LOW_NAME, LOW_DIST, MID_NAME, MID_DIST, HI_NAME, HI_DIST, CF_NAME, CF_DIST, CONVE_NAME, CONVE_DIST, ART_NAME, ART_DIST FROM AI_LEARN WHERE ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{address} || '%'
